description: Helm of Saint-14 synergizes with Edge of Action by void synergy. Focus on weakening foes and feeding the Void for devour. Protect your team with an impenetrable shield. Your aspects (Bastion + Controlled Demolition) amplify this synergy. Additional synergies: Ability: Sentinel Shield, **GOD ROLL**: Bubble blinds enemies (Saint-14 effect works on glaive bubble).

Actium War Rig synergizes with Sweet Business by ability: neutral / any. Focus on versatile damage output. Become a missile and obliterate targets. Your aspects (Knockout + Touch of Thunder) amplify this synergy. Additional synergies: **GOD ROLL**: God Roll: Never stop firing; Actium keeps the drum full constantly., Buffs Auto Rifle

Stronghold synergizes with Praxic Blade by ability: neutral / any. Focus on versatile damage output. Become a missile and obliterate targets. Your aspects (Knockout + Touch of Thunder) amplify this synergy. Additional synergies: **GOD ROLL**: ABSOLUTE META: Defensive powerhouse using Praxic Blade projectile properties., Buffs Sword

Doom Fang Pauldron synergizes with Monte Carlo by ability: sentinel shield. Focus on weakening foes and feeding the Void for devour. Protect your team with an impenetrable shield. Your aspects (Bastion + Controlled Demolition) amplify this synergy. Additional synergies: **GOD ROLL**: Super Loop: Void melee kills give Super; Monte Carlo gives melee., Melee

Wishful Ignorance synergizes with Monte Carlo by ability: frenzied blade. Focus on unraveling enemies and suspending threats. Use your Bladefury strategically. Your aspects (Banner of War + Into the Fray) amplify this synergy. Additional synergies: **GOD ROLL**: S-Tier Melee Loop: Continuous Frenzied Blade charges for maximum damage uptime., Melee

Actium War Rig synergizes with Sweet Business by ability: neutral / any. Focus on combining Light and Dark abilities for transcendent power. Unleash Light and Dark weaponry in a transcendent fury.
